name: Songs From the IRON SEA 2022
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Songs from the IRON SEA is a poetic platformer set in a whimsical aquatic universe, portraying a creature lost in a metal nightmare. Guided by a kind entity, she'll have to escape the foreman's gaze to regain her freedom. Immerse yourself in a contrasted emotional journey with delicate visuals.

Platform: PC
Engine: Unity
Number of players: 1

Game & Level Designer : Lucas COQUET, Florian PONS
3D Character - Rig - Animation - VFX &Tech Artist - Organization Helper : Morgane PAULMIER
Game et Narrative Designer - Programmer : Nicolas PERDU
3D Artist Concept / Enviro / Props / Texture / Lighting & Graphic Design : Aurore KONIG
Game Designer & Programmer : Toby TELLIER
